tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE location_quests (
    quest_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    quest_name VARCHAR(50),
    quest_description TEXT,
    location_id INT,
    level_required INT,
    reward_type VARCHAR(20),
    reward_amount INT
);

CREATE TABLE missions (
  mission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  mission_name VARCHAR(255),
  mission_description TEXT,
  required_level INT,
  location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE missions (
  mission_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  mission_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  mission_description TEXT,
  mission_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  quest_id UUID REFERENCES quests(quest_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE quests (
    quest_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    quest_name VARCHAR(255),
    quest_description TEXT,
    location_id INT,
    required_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE missions (
    mission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    mission_name VARCHAR(255),
    mission_description TEXT,
    location_id INT,
    required_level INT,
    quest_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(255),
    region VARCHAR(100),
    climate VARCHAR(100),
    population INT
);

CREATE TABLE quests (
    quest_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title TEXT NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    level INT,
    location_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE missions (
    mission_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title TEXT NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    reward TEXT,
    quest_id UUID    
);

CREATE TABLE players (
    player_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    level INT,
    location_id INT,
    last_login TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE player_missions (
    player_id UUID,
    mission_id UUID,
    status VARCHAR,
    completion_date DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (player_id, mission_id)
);
